| Origin                  = Created to fight the Skrull gods for the ''[[Secret Invasion]]''

| PlaceOfDissolution      = Skrull Dreamtime
| Creators                = Greg Pak; Fred van Lente; Rafa Sandoval
| First                   = Incredible Hercules #117

| HistoryText             = The God Squad was assembled by the [[Council of Godheads (Earth-616)|Council of Godheads]], at the behest of [[Athena Parthenos (Earth-616)|Athena]], in order to fight against the [[Skrull Pantheon (Earth-616)|Skrull Pantheon]]. Though most of the members are scattered or destroyed at the final confrontation, [[Hercules Panhellenios (Earth-616)|Hercules]], [[Amadeus Cho (Earth-616)|Amadeus Cho]], and [[Narya (Earth-616)|Snowbird]] survive to return to Earth, having fulfilled their mission of crushing the alien deities, while [[Amatsu-Mikaboshi (Earth-616)|Amatsu-Mikaboshi]] rules over the alien gods, free of the seal of the [[Amatsu-Kami|Kami]] at last.
